data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 57,060 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint James, Jamaica
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Saint James, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Saint James, Jamaica.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Saint James, Jamaica a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Montego Bay
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Montego Bay, Saint James, Jamaica.
There are 191,800 people living in the state of Saint James. Only about 57,060 might be believers.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Saint James, Jamaica to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 57,060 believers in Saint James against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
